archimate:Requirement.name: SA.1.3.7: Additional controls should be applied to special access privileges (e.g. root in UNIX or Administrator in Windows systems and powerful system utilities) and/or privileges required to perform trusted tasks(e.g. authorise payments or perform financial transactions), which include:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
